fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to parse the PubMed documents of search results (for more details see (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/entrez/query/DTD/pubmed_060101.dtd). The specified directory will be searched for xml, gz or zip files, if recursive search is activated the subdirectories are going to be searched too. All the contained xml, gz or zip files are parsed. The document data is stored in the outgoing data table.
fullDescription.option: Set the directory containing the files to parse.
If checked, the specified directory is searched for files recursively.
If checked, hidden files will not be considered for parsing.
Specifies the category of the documents.
Specifies the source of the documents. If no source is specified the PubMed default source "PubMed" is used by default.
Specifies the type of the documents.

ports.outPort: An output table containing the parsed document data.
